attributes.additional_details: This man is deserving of this honour.
attributes.background:
Pat Jennings played over 1,000 senior games and was an example to everyone of how to conduct yourself as a man and as a professional footballer.
He is one of the all-time greats and an exemplary ambassodor for Northern Ireland and for British football.
He deserves to be called Sir Pat Jennings.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
